cause.description:
The Ethereals delivered us from Mont'au, uniting the four castes: Fio (Earth), Kor (Air), Por (Water), and Shas (Fire). In doing so they prevented our race from self-genocide and sowed the seeds for a mighty empire destined to bring the Greater Good to all living beings.
1. You live for the Greater Good
2. The Greater Good claims rights to all lands and peoples
3. To deny the Greater Good is to invite Mont'au
cause.mission: Unite the universe under the teachings of the Ethereals
cause.name: The Greater Good
